question: Which passengers traveled the most in Q1 2024 based on number of flights?
query:
SELECT p.passenger_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, COUNT(*) AS flight_count
FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass bp
JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON bp.passenger_id = p.passenger_id
WHERE bp.boarding_time >= '2024-01-01' 
  AND bp.boarding_time < '2024-04-01'
GROUP BY p.passenger_id, p.first_name, p.last_name
ORDER BY flight_count DESC;
